channel.title: CVE Feed for ProClima -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for ProClima -- all products

item.title: CVE-2019-6825|2024-08-04T20:31:04.398Z -- proclima -- proclima%20all%20versions%20prior%20to%20version%208.0.0
item.description: A CWE-427: Uncontrolled Search Path Element vulnerability exists in ProClima (all versions prior to version 8.0.0) which could allow a malicious DLL file, with the same name of any resident DLLs inside the software installation, to execute arbitrary code in all versions of ProClima prior to version 8.0.0.

item.title: CVE-2019-6823|2024-08-04T20:31:04.400Z -- proclima -- proclima%20all%20versions%20prior%20to%20version%208.0.0
item.description: A CWE-94: Code Injection vulnerability exists in ProClima (all versions prior to version 8.0.0) which could allow an unauthenticated, remote attacker to execute arbitrary code on the targeted system in all versions of ProClima prior to version 8.0.0.

item.title: CVE-2019-6824|2024-08-04T20:31:04.436Z -- proclima -- proclima%20all%20versions%20prior%20to%20version%208.0.0
item.description: A CWE-119: Buffer Errors vulnerability exists in ProClima (all versions prior to version 8.0.0) which allows an unauthenticated, remote attacker to execute arbitrary code on the targeted system in all versions of ProClima prior to version 8.0.0.
